text:
@realDonaldTrump Since you're 'just asking':

It's called the UNITED STATES OF AMERICA for a reason. 

Why should the taxpayers of America be bailing out billion dollar corporations and cruise lines?

Why should we be bailing out your businesses IF you're a billionaire?

https://t.co/PQYKDuPkCY

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
